Version of the eshop: v0.6

info.description:
On this script you will find:
-Movies and series in .cia format:  2/Homebrew:  2
-Games and updates 3ds in .cia format:  54
-Games DSiWare in .cia format:  4
-Games Nes and SNES in .cia format:  9
-Games Genesis/MD in .cia format:  1
-Games Gba, Gbc and Gb in .cia format:  14
